schema:creator: Juliao, Marta
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ I worked on a project donating 25 original acrylic paintings for hospice patients at Snowline Hospice in El Dorado County. They have been isolated due to the virus. This is their Father's Day gift. I painted them in a period of 30 days. I am hoping to brighten their day.The paintings have been already donatedso I only have pictures of each one now.  
 __Participant age:__ 53  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Drawing or Painting
schema:name: Spreading love
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
